channel.title: Engadget
channel.description: Engadget is a web magazine with obsessive daily coverage of everything new in gadgets and consumer electronics
channel.copyright: Copyright (c) 2021 Yahoo! Inc. All rights reserved

item.title: Twitch lowers subscription prices in most countries to reflect the cost of living
item.description: Twitch is lowering subscription prices in most countries to reflect the cost of living and make it easier to support local creators.

item.title: Amazon Music Unlimited plans now include HD streaming at no extra cost
item.description: Just as Apple Music introduces high-fidelity streaming.

item.title: Apple's latest Pride-themed Watch bands are more representative
item.description: Since 2016, Apple has released a limited-edition, Pride-themed Watch band and face, and this year is no exception. The company just announced the 2021 Apple Watch Pride Edition, with two new straps and a watch face that'll be available to everyone through a forthcoming software update.

item.title: Apple Music will offer Dolby Atmos and lossless streaming starting next month
item.description: Apple Music is adding Dolby Atmos and lossless streaming at no additional cost.

item.title: A bug let Eufy security camera owners access strangers' feeds
item.description: Anker's Eufy security cameras are suffering from a privacy bug that lets users access others' feeds.

item.title: AT&T's WarnerMedia is merging with Discovery
item.description: AT&T has announced that it's spinning off its WarnerMedia division and merging it with Discovery in a $43 billion deal.

item.title: The redesigned 2021 iMac is already discounted at Amazon
item.description: Apple's 2021 iMac featuring the M1 chip is available for $40 off its original price at Amazon.

item.title: 'Watch Dogs: Legion' will add a 60 FPS performance mode for PS5 and Xbox Series X
item.description: Ubisoft is releasing a new 'Watch Dogs: Legion' update that adds support for 60 FPS on PS5 and Xbox Series X/S.

item.title: The Morning After: Tesla Model S prototype with retractable spoiler spotted
item.description: Today’s headlines: Amazon debuts another free video streaming service in India, Sharp is still making smartphones and its latest device has a huge one-inch camera sensor and Tesla's Model S Plaid may pack a retractable spoiler.

item.title: Apple teases a Music announcement as more 'Lossless' clues appear
item.description: An Apple teaser and newly discovered clues have reinforced the idea that Apple Music is about to launch a new HiFi tier.

item.title: Samsung teases its next generation of flexible displays
item.description: Samsung has unveiled new foldable displays that could be used on future phones and tablets.

item.title: Sharp's powerful Aquos R6 features a huge one-inch camera sensor
item.description: We don't hear much about Sharp's smartphones these days, but the company has just unveiled a new model, the Aquos R6, that's loaded with interesting tech.

item.title: Mooer crams a drum machine, effects and a looper into a six-string guitar
item.description: Mooer Audio is readying a six-string guitar with a drum machine, 126 effects and a looper — you may not need much else to create music.

item.title: Samsung's leaked Galaxy A22 may be its most affordable 5G phone to date
item.description: Samsung is reportedly prepping the Galaxy A22, which could be the company's lowest-priced 5G phone so far.

item.title: Clubhouse will make its Android app available worldwide in a week
item.description: Clubhouse now expects its Android app to be available worldwide within a week after limiting it to US beta testers.

item.title: Tesla's Model S Plaid may pack a retractable spoiler
item.description: Tesla appears to be testing a Model S Plaid with a retractable spoiler, hinting at just how fast the EV could be.

item.title: AT&T and Discovery may combine content to take on Disney+ and Netflix
item.description: AT&T and Discovery are reportedly in talks to combine their content in hopes of taking on streaming rivals like Netflix and Disney.

item.title: Learn how to market your mobile app with this $15 training bundle
item.description: The 2021 Ultimate Mobile App Marketing A-Z Bundle contains 10 hours of content that will teach you to use digital marketing skills and tools to grow your brand online.

item.title: The Roku Streambar is back on sale for $100 at Amazon
item.description: Roku's Streambar has dropped back to a tempting $100 price in an Amazon sale, and the Ultra player is down to $70 as well.

item.title: 'Final Fantasy XIV Online' Endwalker expansion arrives on November 23rd
item.description: Endwalker, Final Fantasy XIV Online's fourth expansion pack, is coming out on November 23rd.

item.title: Amazon debuts another free video streaming service, this time in India
item.description: Amazon has launched a new free video service, MiniTV — but it's only available in India, at least for now.

item.title: Android 12 might include big changes to notifications and widgets
item.description: A purported Android 12 interface leak hints at a major visual overhaul as well as new approaches to notifications and widgets.

item.title: Twitter's subscription service might cost $3 per month
item.description: A leak hints that Twitter's upcoming subscription service, Blue, will cost $3 per month with features like Undo Tweets and Collections.

item.title: LG's 2021 soundbars arrive in the US starting at $179
item.description: LG has announced the pricing and availability of its 2021 soundbar lineup for the US.

item.title: President Biden revokes Trump order limiting social media protections
item.description: President Biden has revoked a Trump executive order that let the federal government intervene when companies cracked down on social media posts.
